oNama.oNama-Info1: has existed since 1993 and our core business is the distribution of hardware for construction joinery and furniture fittings.
oNama.oNama-Info2: Dabel is a team of ambitious, capable, young people ready for growth and further development in providing the best possible services.
oNama.oNama-KljucniJedan: a business facility was built with an area of 5000 m², housing our production, customs warehouse, technical department, shipping and sales departments, as well as all necessary conditions for quality operation of a company aiming to maintain a leading position in the Serbian market.
oNama.oNama-KljucniDva: we expanded and opened a branch in Montenegro.
oNama.oNama-KljucniTri: we continued expanding by opening branches in Kosovo, Bosnia, North Macedonia, and Albania.
oNama.oNama-NaseVrednostiJedan: Customer care, fair relationships with partners, and concern for the work environment are our top priorities. We strive to maintain long-term quality and introduce innovations to simplify ordering and delivery of goods.
oNama.oNama-NaseVrednostiDva: we introduced B2B ordering, allowing our partners to place orders at any time.
oNama.oNama-NaseVrednostiTri_Jedan: we started offering product ordering through
oNama.oNama-NaseVrednostiTri_Dva: which is continuously improved and provides all necessary product information to our partners.
oNama.oNama-NaseVrednostiPet: Our mission is to act responsibly, focusing on customer care as well as improving the quality of our products.

usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Jedan: allows you to use the services and content of its website in accordance with the terms of use stated below. The terms apply to all content and services of the site.
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Dva: Users are considered to be familiar with these terms if they use any part of the site, and to accept that the use of this website’s content is for personal use only and at their own risk.
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Tri: has copyright on all materials (textual, visual and audio materials, databases and program code). Unauthorized use of any part of the site without the owner's permission is considered a copyright violation and may lead to legal consequences.
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Cetiri: In case of important changes and amendments to the terms, Dabel d.o.o. may notify users via email or by publishing on the website.
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Pet: By using the site, you are deemed to be familiar with the latest terms of use and privacy policy.
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Sest: Dabel d.o.o. strives to provide accurate information about products, including images, descriptions and technical details, but does not guarantee full accuracy due to possible technical errors. Product colours on screen may differ from actual ones.
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Sedam: The data you leave on the site is for internal use and will be protected in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Act. We use your data exclusively for processing requests, informing about offers, and communication with our team.
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Osam: Data will not be published or shared with third parties without your consent.
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Devet: The site may contain links to other locations for a better user experience. Dabel d.o.o. is not responsible for the content of external sites.
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Deset: During selection and hiring, the candidate agrees that Dabel d.o.o. uses their data only for selection purposes. Data is stored on internal servers and is not forwarded to third parties.
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Jedanest_Jedan: Candidates may at any time withdraw consent by contacting via email address
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Jedanest_Dva: after which their data will be deleted from the database.

posao.posao-Dva: Applications with resume should be sent to:
posao.posao-Tri: We thank in advance all interested candidates.
